rlbox-wasmitme
2021-03-08 Meeting between Fastly, Mozilla, and UCSD on RLBox migration to Wasmtime from Lucet Till: Summary about Lucet Lucet no longer getting new features only recent feature is lucet adding fuel so host can switch sandboxes acc to this Shravan: explains rlbox and how rlbox + AOT wasm compil...
(fwiw I think these messages are going to a different stream than the "initial work" one -- https://bytecodealliance.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/281522-lucet-wasmtime-migration/topic/initial.20work)
